Detailed Description

Various learning algorithm classes are defined to train learning machines. Learning machines are generally subclasses of <gb-module>. Learning algorithm classes include gradient descent for supervised learning, and others. Abstract class for energy-based learning algorithms. The class contains an input, a (trainable) parameter, and an energy. this is an abstract class from which actual trainers can be derived.
